Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_JOB_RATE_MATRIX_SP" ( P_JOB_RUN_ID IN NUMBER, P_JOB_USER_ID IN NUMBER, P_SCHEDULER_PREP NUMBER DEFAULT 0, P_CREATE_RECORDS NUMBER DEFAULT 0, P_COPY_RECORDS NUMBER DEFAULT 0, P_INCREMENTAL_ONLY NUMBER DEFAULT 0, P_TEAM_ONLY NUMBER DEFAULT 0 ) IS BEGIN NBI_PROJ_RATES_AND_COSTS_SP ( P_SCHEDULER_PREP, P_CREATE_RECORDS, P_COPY_RECORDS, P_INCREMENTAL_ONLY, P_TEAM_ONLY); EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR ( -20000, 'Error in CMN_JOB_RATE_MATRIX_SP - ' || SQLERRM ); END;
